name: Titanium.UI.Matrix3D
summary: The 3D Matrix is an object for holding values for a 3D affine transform.

methods.name: invert
methods.summary: Returns a matrix constructed by inverting this matrix.

methods.name: multiply
methods.summary: Returns a matrix constructed by combining two existing matrix.
methods.description: The result of this function is the first matrix multiplied by the second matrix. You might perform several multiplications in order to create a single matrix that contains the cumulative effects of several transformations. Note that matrix operations are not commutative - the order in which you concatenate matrices is important. That is, the result of multiplying matrix t1 by matrix t2 does not necessarily equal the result of multiplying matrix t2 by matrix t1.

methods.name: rotate
methods.summary: Returns a matrix constructed by rotating this matrix.

parameters.name: angle
parameters.summary: The angle, in degrees, by which to rotate the matrix. A positive value specifies counterclockwise rotation and a negative value specifies clockwise rotation.

parameters.name: x
parameters.summary: The x part of the vector about which to rotate.

parameters.name: y
parameters.summary: The y part of the vector about which to rotate.

parameters.name: z
parameters.summary: The z part of the vector about which to rotate.

methods.name: scale
methods.summary: Returns a matrix constructed by scaling this matrix.

parameters.name: sx
parameters.summary: The value by which to scale x values of the matrix.

parameters.name: sy
parameters.summary: The value by which to scale y values of the matrix.

parameters.name: sz
parameters.summary: The value by which to scale z values of the matrix.

methods.name: translate
methods.summary: Returns a matrix constructed by translating an existing matrix.

parameters.name: tx
parameters.summary: The value by which to move x values with the matrix.

parameters.name: ty
parameters.summary: The value by which to move y values with the matrix.

parameters.name: tz
parameters.summary: The value by which to move z values with the matrix.

properties.name: m11
properties.summary: The entry at position [1,1] in the matrix.

properties.name: m12
properties.summary: The entry at position [1,2] in the matrix.

properties.name: m13
properties.summary: The entry at position [1,3] in the matrix.

properties.name: m14
properties.summary: The entry at position [1,4] in the matrix.

properties.name: m21
properties.summary: The entry at position [2,1] in the matrix.

properties.name: m22
properties.summary: The entry at position [2,2] in the matrix.

properties.name: m23
properties.summary: The entry at position [2,3] in the matrix.

properties.name: m24
properties.summary: The entry at position [2,4] in the matrix.

properties.name: m31
properties.summary: The entry at position [3,1] in the matrix.

properties.name: m32
properties.summary: The entry at position [3,2] in the matrix.

properties.name: m33
properties.summary: The entry at position [3,3] in the matrix.

properties.name: m34
properties.summary: The entry at position [3,4] in the matrix.

properties.name: m41
properties.summary: The entry at position [4,1] in the matrix.

properties.name: m42
properties.summary: The entry at position [4,2] in the matrix.

properties.name: m43
properties.summary: The entry at position [4,3] in the matrix.

properties.name: m44
properties.summary: The entry at position [4,4] in the matrix.
